data.text:
(――It's been a while since 
Trainer-san became my trainer.)
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: So in this case, you'd use……

data.processed:
<story>(――It's been a while since 
<story>Trainer-san became my trainer.)

data.text: (……And, today, like most days, they're teaching me English)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: <story>(……And, today, like most days, they're teaching me English)

data.text:
(Hmmmmm~. I'm the one that asked, but is this really okay~? 
This person is supposed to be my trainer for running)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>(Hmmmmm~. I'm the one that asked, but is this really okay~? 
<story>This person is supposed to be my trainer for running)

data.text:
(Fundamentally, they're a serious person. You could say 
their passion and seriousness are on full display)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>(Fundamentally, they're a serious person. You could say 
<story>their passion and seriousness are on full display)

data.text: Haaa…… Haaa……!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: <story>Haaa…… Haaa……!

data.text: 『The last straight!! Keep going!!』
data.processed: <story>『The last straight!! Keep going!!』

data.text: 『The last straight!! Keep going!!』
data.processed: <story>『The last straight!! Keep going!!』

data.text: (Back then, they were really really passionate……)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: <story>(Back then, they were really really passionate……)

data.text: 『That's not all you've got!!』
data.processed: <story>『That's not all you've got!!』

data.text: 『That's not all you've got!!』
data.processed: <story>『That's not all you've got!!』

data.text: (I wondered why they were so desperate~)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: <story>(I wondered why they were so desperate~)

data.text:
(But, it really was something that they could keep coming 
up with those lines. ……that's what happens when you 
have a wide vocabulary, I guess? Right?)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>(But, it really was something that they could keep coming 
<story>up with those lines. ……that's what happens when you 
<story>have a wide vocabulary, I guess? Right?)

data.text:
(They're really enthusiastic. 
……When I think back, it's a little……)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>(They're really enthusiastic. 
<story>……When I think back, it's a little……)

data.text: Fu, fufuu……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: <story>Fu, fufuu……

data.text:
Ah. I'm listening, I was listening! 
Sorry, I'll properly…… ummmm, this word~……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>Ah. I'm listening, I was listening! 
<story>Sorry, I'll properly…… ummmm, this word~……

data.text:
(This won't do. It's pretty rude to stop listening and think 
about other things when I'm the one that asked, isn't it?)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>(This won't do. It's pretty rude to stop listening and think 
<story>about other things when I'm the one that asked, isn't it?)

data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>(They're really busy, and still taking the time to teach 
<story>me…… but when I think about it, isn't that bad? I asked 
<story>for something that's not their job)

data.text:
Gratitude~? To your trainer? Isn't it fine either way? 
Isn't it normal for them to look after you?
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Gratitude~? To your trainer? Isn't it fine either way? 
<story>Isn't it normal for them to look after you?

data.text:
Hmmm~? Is that how it is? 
Is it really okay to include studying in that?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm~? Is that how it is? 
<story>Is it really okay to include studying in that?

data.text:
Isn't that just how it is? Besides, if your grades are bad, 
doesn't that mean you won't be able to properly train? 
There's supplementary lessons after all.
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Isn't that just how it is? Besides, if your grades are bad, 
<story>doesn't that mean you won't be able to properly train? 
<story>There's supplementary lessons after all.

data.text:
Ah~……I suppose so? So I guess that means this is just 
one part of a trainer's work too…… huh~? Really~??
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>Ah~……I suppose so? So I guess that means this is just 
<story>one part of a trainer's work too…… huh~? Really~??

data.text:
Haa, haa, haa……! Trainer-san, 
let's keep going! I can still run!
data.name: Dream-chasing Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, haa……! Trainer-san, 
<story>let's keep going! I can still run!

data.text: I know. But, no. We're stopping here.
data.name: Dream-chasing Trainer
data.processed: <story>I know. But, no. We're stopping here.

data.text: But! In the next race…… I definitely want to win!
data.name: Dream-chasing Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>But! In the next race…… I definitely want to win!

data.text:
There's the next race, and the one after that right? Which means 
we should think about the future too. So we can keep winning……!
data.name: Dream-chasing Trainer
data.processed:
<story>There's the next race, and the one after that right? Which means 
<story>we should think about the future too. So we can keep winning……!

data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text:
(Focusing on victory, huh? Even just watching them as an 
outsider, I can tell there's a difference in passion~)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>(Focusing on victory, huh? Even just watching them as an 
<story>outsider, I can tell there's a difference in passion~)

data.text:
Trainer-san is more like them, right? 
I wonder if they have any thoughts about that.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san is more like them, right? 
<story>I wonder if they have any thoughts about that.

data.text:
Even with that difference, I wonder if it's still fun~. 
They're not getting bored right~?……wait, huh?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>Even with that difference, I wonder if it's still fun~. 
<story>They're not getting bored right~?……wait, huh?

data.text: (……Heh. They're humming while getting ready)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: <story>(……Heh. They're humming while getting ready)

data.text: Trainer-san, are you…… having fun now?
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: Of course! I'm expecting great things!

data.processed: <story>Trainer-san, are you…… having fun now?

data.text: O-oh…… you're energetic even before training, huh?
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: You can do it! Do your best!

data.processed: <story>O-oh…… you're energetic even before training, huh?

data.text:
Wai-, why are you as enthusiastic as when I'm running? 
……Fuu, ahahahaa. You're too spirited!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>Wai-, why are you as enthusiastic as when I'm running? 
<story>……Fuu, ahahahaa. You're too spirited!

data.text:
(……Are they doing that on purpose? Are they trying to be 
considerate? Or is a conversation like this part of the 『fun』?)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>(……Are they doing that on purpose? Are they trying to be 
<story>considerate? Or is a conversation like this part of the 『fun』?)

data.text: …… Okaaaay.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: <story>…… Okaaaay.

data.text:
(While I might not be able to match that energy and enthusiasm…… 
just watching Trainer-san is kinda fun for me too)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>(While I might not be able to match that energy and enthusiasm…… 
<story>just watching Trainer-san is kinda fun for me too)

data.text:
Well…… guess I can just think about it later. 
For now, I'll do my best today too~.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
<story>Well…… guess I can just think about it later. 
<story>For now, I'll do my best today too~.
